txt.en: 'We have received urgent news that a band of Ordâkhai have invaded Gha Nêkha and are attacking and bullying the locals. We are unable to send a Dumûri force to that area, but perhaps you are capable of handling the situation?'
You have saved the people of Gha Nêkha! Return with the Dumûri scout to report your success.
There is no twist in this mission.
A band of Ordâkhai have invaded Gha Nêkha and are harassing the locals.
'Thank you for helping the people of Gha Nêkha. It is unlikely they would have stood up to the Ordâkhai on their own.'
'Your mission is to remove the Ordâkhai soldiers from Gha Nêkha.'
Complete Mission: Rescue at Gha Nêkha
Your mission is to help the people of Gha Nêkha by forcibly removing the Ordâkhai soldiers there.\n\nTalk to Khâdamul when you are ready to travel to Gha Nêkha.
